snippet: The federal government has fallen short of its promise of restoring balance to a broken system used for deportation cases.
abstract: Editorial laments that the federal government has fallen short of its promise to restore balance to the system used for deportation cases; cites news report finding that fewer than 2 percent of deportation cases have been closed under a policy that aimed to limit deportation of noncriminal illegal immigrants; urges Pres Obama to act to protect those who would be well on their way to citizenship if not for a broken system.
lead_paragraph: The federal government has fallen short of its promise of restoring balance to a broken system used for deportation cases.
